abstract: Anheuser-Busch Inbev has put its operations in seven Central European countries up for sale, according to the Belgian daily Le Soir.
snippet: Anheuser-Busch Inbev has put its operations in seven Central European countries up for sale, according to the Belgian daily Le Soir.
lead_paragraph: Anheuser-Busch InBev has put its operations in seven Central European countries up for sale, according to the Belgian daily Le Soir. The region, fragmented by small national markets, is seen as no longer strategic to the beverage company, the newspaper said.

headline.main: AB-InBev Said to Be Pulling Out of Central Europe
